value.title: Overcoming AI’s Transparency Paradox
value.excerpt: AI has a well-documented but poorly understood transparency problem. 51% of business executives report that AI transparency and ethics are important for their business, and not surprisingly, 41% of senior executives state that they have suspended an AI tool because of a potential ethical issue.

value.title: Manage your Amazon Fraud Detector resources in an automated and secure manner using AWS CloudFormation
value.excerpt: Amazon Fraud Detector is a fully managed service that makes it easy to identify potentially fraudulent online activities, such as the creation of fake accounts or online payment fraud. Unlike general-purpose machine learning (ML) packages, Amazon Fraud Detector is designed specifically to detect fraud.

value.title: Agile Robots closes $220M Series C funding

value.excerpt: Ethical AI will be critical to widespread AI adoption. Algorithms used in care delivery must perform well across diverse patient populations.

value.title: How To Help Tame Cognitive Bias In Your AI System

value.title: AWS bringing two new advanced statistics to German Bundesliga broadcasts for upcoming season
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services is rolling out two new Match Facts for the German Bundesliga during the 2021–22 season, bringing new advanced statistics to the game broadcasts and the official Bundesliga app. The two new statistics -- Shot Efficiency and Passing Profile -- will provide fans with deeper insights into the number of goals a player or team should have scored based on the quality of their chances as well as information on the pass quality of a player or an entire team.

value.title: Finally! A robot vacuum with AI that can sniff out (and avoid) dog poop
value.excerpt: They’re finally going there…so to speak. In what may be the biggest boon to animal lovers since pet food in a can, rolling robot vacuum maker iRobot has come up with an AI-assisted way for its newest model to tell the difference between pet poop and regular floor clutter.

value.title: Microsoft explores machine learning in space with AIML
value.excerpt: Microsoft joins the University of Adelaide’s Australian Institute for Machine Learning (AIML) to explore how machine learning can be used in space.

value.title: Ethical Artificial Intelligence is Focus of New Robotics Program
value.excerpt: Ethics will be at the forefront of robotics education thanks to a new University of Texas at Austin program that will train tomorrow's technologists to understand the positive — and potentially negative — implications of their creations.

value.title: Facebook developing machine learning chip - The Information
value.excerpt: Facebook Inc is developing a machine learning chip to handle tasks such as content recommendation to users, The Information reported on Thursday, citing two people familiar with the project.
